plot: A romance that was destined to be, becomes altered by a man's insecurity and a woman's pride. Will their love stand the test of time?
title: Shen qing bi jiu nong
plot_es: A romance that was destined to be, becomes altered by a man's insecurity and a woman's pride. Will their love stand the test of time?
plot_en: A romance that was destined to be, becomes altered by a man's insecurity and a woman's pride. Will their love stand the test of time?
